biocontainers.name: qtltools
biocontainers.summary: Tool set for molecular qtl discovery and analysis

biotools.summary: Tool set for molecular QTL discovery and analysis. It allows to go from the raw sequence data to collection of molecular Quantitative Trait Loci (QTLs) in few easy-to-perform steps.

bioschemas.name: QTLtools
bioschemas.summary: Tool set for molecular QTL discovery and analysis. It allows to go from the raw sequence data to collection of molecular Quantitative Trait Loci (QTLs) in few easy-to-perform steps.
